profile:
Astrobiologist and exobiology expert with over 15 years of applied research
experience in remote and hazardous environments. Proven leadership on
interstellar missions and deep-space expeditions, with extensive expertise in
extraterrestrial sample collection, biological risk assessment, and AI-driven
research methodologies. Skilled in bridging scientific insight with operational
mission strategy under extreme isolation and high-stakes conditions.

bullets.company: European Space Agency (ESA) \u2013 Titan Life Probe Mission
experience: Directed biological investigations during planetary surface missions to Titan, supporting extraterrestrial environmental research.
Led collection and preservation of organic compounds and microbial samples in extreme extraterrestrial conditions.
Collaborated with engineering teams to integrate scientific findings into navigation and mission operational planning.
Advised mission stakeholders on biological risks and opportunities pertinent to planetary exploration objectives.
Compiled detailed scientific reports to interstellar regulatory authorities and mission command, ensuring compliance with safety protocols.
Led analysis of microbial extremophiles in simulated exoplanetary environments supporting planetary survey initiatives.
Developed AI-assisted data pipelines for autonomous classification of extraterrestrial biological samples.
Established protocols for extraterrestrial sample containment to ensure protocols compliance and contamination control.
Contributed to feasibility assessments of exploratory-class vessel missions through biological research insights.
Integrated biological research findings into mission strategies for space exploration and extraterrestrial biology studies.
Conducted planetary analog studies in Earth\'s extreme environments to support extraterrestrial biological research.
Published research on microbial survivability related to vacuum and radiation, relevant to space environment hazards.
Served as scientific liaison for planetary exploration missions, emphasizing sample collection and biosafety protocols.
Supported planetary science research methodologies aligned with interstellar survey protocols.
Contributed to mission planning for Mars and Europa exploration using biological and environmental risk assessments.
